actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Surface Transportation.

official_title: A bill to make reconstruction of a portion of the Mianus River bridge in the vicinity of Greenwich, Connecticut, eligible for emergency relief under section 125 of title 23, United States Code.

summary.text: Makes a project for the repair of the bridge on Interstate 95 which crosses the Mianus River in Greenwich, Connecticut, eligible for emergency relief.

titles.title: A bill to make reconstruction of a portion of the Mianus River bridge in the vicinity of Greenwich, Connecticut, eligible for emergency relief under section 125 of title 23, United States Code.
